Text: WOW!! 47 books in less than 2 megs. Sounds like Bullshit to me but since they are zipped I'm not going to spend the time to find out.

It's sort of bullshit, in a way.    Most  of the "books" appear to be short stories from "Night Shift"... but it's still a VERY worthwhile download.  Includes some real classics like "the Shining" and "Carrie".  There are three torrents for Carrie on Pirate Bay, and all three of them appear to be deader than Elvis... and it all downloaded in about two minutes!  Great download, much thanks!

This and  the 1400 SciFi are my first torrent uploads. These were given to me, so I'm sharing. Some are good, some are not, but I have 1000's of ebooks on my computer (over 5GB!)

Glad someone likes them. ;>)

Please seed for others.
Note:  Does NOT contain The Shining... that was my mistake.
That 1400 ebook torrent DOES contain the shining, and several King books not available here.  That was also a surprisingly quick download and highly reccomended.
i don't want to be a party pooper but when i unzipped this torrent there was only 39 html ebooks, they are fantastic with a few missing, recommended.
Sorry, I just counted the files listed. ;>) I'll try to do better in the description in the future. Hope you enjoyed what was in this anyway.
